scenarios.title: Successful user registration with valid email and strong password
scenarios.description: Ensure users can register successfully with a valid email and a strong password.
preconditions: User is on the registration page

steps.action: Enter a valid email address in the email field
steps.expectedResult: The email is accepted by the system

steps.action: Enter a strong password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: The password is accepted by the system
User registration is successful and confirmation message is displayed

scenarios.expectedOutcome: User registration is successful, and the user is redirected to the dashboard or login page.

scenarios.title: Registration fails with invalid email format
scenarios.description: Ensure that the system does not allow registration with an invalid email format.
preconditions: User is on the registration page

steps.action: Enter an invalid email address in the email field
steps.expectedResult: The email is marked as invalid, and an error message is displayed

steps.action: Enter a strong password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: The password is accepted by the system
Registration fails, and the user is prompted to correct the email field.

scenarios.expectedOutcome: Registration is blocked, and an appropriate error message is displayed for the invalid email.

scenarios.title: Registration fails with weak password
scenarios.description: Ensure that the system does not allow registration with a weak password.
preconditions: User is on the registration page

steps.action: Enter a valid email address in the email field
steps.expectedResult: The email is accepted by the system

steps.action: Enter a weak password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: The password is marked as weak, and an error message is displayed
Registration fails, and the user is prompted to use a stronger password.

scenarios.expectedOutcome: Registration is blocked, and an appropriate error message is displayed for the weak password.

scenarios.title: Edge case: Registration with maximum allowed email length
scenarios.description: Ensure the system allows registration with the maximum allowed email length.
preconditions: User is on the registration page

steps.action: Enter a valid email address with the maximum allowed length
steps.expectedResult: The email is accepted by the system

steps.action: Enter a strong password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: The password is accepted by the system
User registration is successful, and a confirmation message is displayed.

scenarios.expectedOutcome: User registration is successful with the maximum allowed email length.

scenarios.title: Edge case: Registration with minimum allowed password length
scenarios.description: Ensure the system allows registration with the minimum allowed password length.
preconditions: User is on the registration page

steps.action: Enter a valid email address in the email field
steps.expectedResult: The email is accepted by the system

steps.action: Enter the minimum length password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: The password is accepted by the system
User registration is successful, and a confirmation message is displayed.

scenarios.expectedOutcome: User registration is successful with the minimum allowed password length.

recommendations: Automate the validation tests for email and password to ensure consistency and efficiency.
Perform security testing to ensure passwords are not stored in plain text.
Test across different browsers and devices for compatibility.
